    • getFileParser

      public static org.apache.commons.csv.CSVParser getFileParser​(java.lang.String dataset)
      Helper method to get the CSVParser object for a dataset to be used
      参数:
      dataset - The dataset to be used
      返回:
      The CSVParser object

    • getCountryList

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getCountryList​(java.lang.String dataset)
      Helper method to get the list of all countries in the dataset
      参数:
      dataset - The dataset to be used
      返回:
      The list of all countries in the dataset

    • getFeature

      public static java.lang.Double getFeature​(java.lang.String dataset, java.lang.String feature, java.lang.String country, java.lang.String date)
      Get the required value of specified feature from the data set
      参数:
      dataset - The dataset to be used
      feature - The name of the feature required
      country - The country of interest
      date - The date of interest in the standard form of the dataset
      返回:
      The value of the feature on the date for the country

    • getStartDate

      public static java.lang.String getStartDate​(java.lang.String country)
      Helper function to get the first date that has data for a country
      参数:
      country - The country of interest
      返回:
      The first date that has data for the country

    • laterthan

      public static int laterthan​(java.lang.String date1, java.lang.String date2)
      Helper function to compare two dates
      参数:
      date1 - The first date in the standard form of the dataset
      date2 - The second date in the standard form of the dataset
      返回:
      The difference of days for the two dates if date 1 is later than date 2, 0 otherwise

    • getConfirmedCases

      public static java.lang.String getConfirmedCases​(java.lang.String dataset, java.lang.String iso_code)
      Get the confirmed case data for task 0
      参数:
      dataset - The dataset to be used
      iso_code - The iso_code specifing the country of interest
      返回:
      The report of the confirmed case data of the country to be shown in task 0

    • getConfirmedCasesPerPeriod

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.Double> getConfirmedCasesPerPeriod​(java.lang.String dataset, java.lang.String country, Period period)
      Get the total confirmed case data for a country over a specific period
      参数:
      dataset - The dataset to be used
      country - The country of interest
      period - The Period instance of the period of interest
      返回:
      The list of total confirmed cases for this country of each day within the period
